column2: MASSACHUSETTS DRIVER'S LICENSE TEST
Question Text
1. A yellow arrow means:
column4: If you intend to turn in the direction of the arrow, be prepared to stop.
column6: Do not go in the direction of the arrow.
column8: The same as a steady yellow light.

column2: 2. A driver approaching a flashing red traffic signal must:
column8: carefully drive through the intersection without stopping.
column10: slow down at the traffic signal.

column2: 3. You reach an intersection that is not controlled at the same time as a driver on your right, and both of you prepare to go straight. Who has the right-of-way?
4. The driver of an emergency vehicle that uses lights and a siren can legally:
5. In case of skidding, drivers should NOT:
column4: take their foot off the gas pedal.
column6: tap the gas pedal with their foot.
column8: steer the car into the direction of the skid.
column10: pump the brakes gently if they are about to hit something.

column2: 6. Which of the following is true about the Anti-Locking Brake System?
column4: It allows drivers to steer during an emergency braking situation.

column2: 7. What is the meaning of red traffic signs?
column8: Stop, do not enter or wrong way.

column2: 8. This sign means:
column4: The road will curve to the right, then to the left.
column6: Winding road ahead. Drive with caution.
column10: Road slippery when wet. Drive slowly.

column2: 9. Never make a U-turn from:
column10: the left part of the lane nearest to the centerline of the roadway.

column2: 10. This road sign means:
column6: Watch for vehicles entering from the side

column2: 11. When entering a highway from an entrance ramp, drivers should:
column4: accelerate to the speed of traffic.
column6: enter slowly to avoid other vehicles.
column8: drive above the speed of traffic to get ahead.
column10: stop first, then gradually enter traffic.

column2: 12. When driving in travel lanes on the roadway:
column4: you may make back up quickly if there are no vehicles behind.
column6: you may make a U-turn if you get on the wrong entrance ramp of the freeway.
column8: do not stop for any reason, keep moving until you can safely pull off the road.
column10: you may stop to let out passengers.

column2: 13. Hydroplaning is a situation in which:
column4: one of your tires goes flat, causing the others to skid.
column6: your tires throw water to the rear, causing problems for the vehicles behind.
column8: the tires of the car ahead cause sheets of water to splash on your vehicle.
column10: your tires ride up on a thin surface of water, losing contact with the pavement, and resulting in sudden loss of control

column2: 14. What do pennant-shaped signs indicate?
15. The yield sign means:
column4: You must come to a complete stop.
column6: Slow down and give vehicles crossing your path the right-of-way.
column8: Drive with caution in wet weather.
column10: The traffic light will soon be red.

column2: 16. Which signs have black letters on a yellow or orange background?
17. When in a motor vehicle on a highway, it is:
column4: permissible to drink a moderate amount of alcohol when driving with a passenger.
column6: illegal to drink from, but permissible to transport, open containers of alcohol in the passenger compartment.
column8: acceptable to drink alcoholic beverages if you are not driving.
column10: illegal to possess an open container of alcohol in the passenger compartment.

column2: 18. You ________ traffic headed toward you when you turn left.
19. This road sign means:
column6: Trucks have the right of way

column2: 20. This road sign means:
column4: No turns are allowed on this road

column2: 21. At a light rail intersection, you should always:
column4: be alert and obey all traffic signals.
column6: look both ways before crossing the tracks.
column8: share the road with pedestrians and bicyclists.

column2: 22. Select the most effective safety restraint(s) in a traffic crash.
column8: A combination of lap/shoulder belt and air bag.

column2: 23. Aggressive driving includes:
column4: quick lane changes without a signal.
column10: yelling, honking, gesturing at other drivers.

column2: 24. This sign indicates:
25. You are approaching an intersection with a yellow flashing light. You should:
column4: proceed with caution through the intersection.
column6: speed up to beat the red light.
column8: stop and wait for the light to change.
column10: prepare to stop; the light is about to turn red.
